page.title: 05POTTEN END-THE NURSERY II.
page.content:
ALTHOUGH THE NURSERY SELLS MOSTLY PLANTS,THEY HAVE SOME ANIMALS AS WELL,THEY ONLY SELL THEM TO THE PUBLIC. THE ANIMALS THEY HAVE ARE THIRTY HENS AND COCKERELS.
THE HENS LAY ROUGHLY THREE DOZEN SMALL EGGS EACH WEEK.
ONLY A FEW OF THE CHICKENS ARE SOLD AND THERE ARE SIX ADULT DUCKS AND SIX DUCKLINGS.
THE DUCKS DO NOT LAY ANY EGGS,AND THEY ARE NOT SOLD,SO THEY ARE KEPT TO ROAM AROUND THE NURSERY.
DURING THE NIGHT THE DUCKS,HENS AND COCKERELS HAVE TO STAY IN A SHED, BECAUSE OF THE DANGER OF FOXES EATING THEM.
